attributes.action: deport anjem choudary on grounds of national security
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this man commits treason against the state is abusive about our soldiers and is a insult to those who have died in the name of democracy. he supports and agrees with sucide bombings on uk soil. we ask for him to be deported to prevent a terrorist atrocity happening in the united kingdom

rejection.details:
Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.

You may want to sign the petition asking for the march to be stopped. 
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/RespectWBassett
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
